channel.title: Game Jam on MCPT Learning Resources
channel.description: Recent content in Game Jam on MCPT Learning Resources

item.title: Tetris Workshop
item.description: Welcome to our workshop on Tetris implementation techniques and skills! Link to sample implementation of Tetris in HSA console. Slideshow that the materials on this site are based off of. Code Resources Tetris Workshop.zip (0 B)

item.title: Resources
item.description: Resources InfoA collection of additional tips & resources to help get you started!

item.title: Leaderboard
item.description: InfoParticipate in our mini-games to earn points towards the Best Gamer Award! Information about scoring will be available over here. Points will be added up with the points from our Game Dev Series to determine a winner.
